MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KA18 area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Hearth Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:04pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:24PM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
